title: Beam Node Explorer API
description: The Node Explorer provides information about current chain state and blocks.

children.value: The Node Explorer provides information about current chain state and blocks.
subdirectory and run with the following arguments:

props.code:
Node explorer options:
  -h [ --help ]                      list of all options
  --peer arg (=172.104.249.212:8101) peer address
  --port arg (=10000)                port to start the local node on
  --api_port arg (=8888)             port to start the local api server on

children.value:
Node explorer options:
  -h [ --help ]                      list of all options
  --peer arg (=172.104.249.212:8101) peer address
  --port arg (=10000)                port to start the local node on
  --api_port arg (=8888)             port to start the local api server on
It may take some time (a few hours) on the first start to load all the info from chain.
: Gets blocks info for specified range, where
